qas.question: During what period did UNFPA aid Peru's reproductive health program?
Peru was found to have been coercing what?
UNFPA responded to Peruvian abuses by calling for what?
UNFPA's goal in Peru was to protect whose rights?
After the scandal became public, what did UNFPA work to reform in Peru?
Who refused aid to Peru's reproductive health program in the mid-to-late '80s?
Peru was found to have been protecting against what?
UNFPA's goal in Peru was to destroy whose rights?
After the scandal became private, what did UNFPA work to reform in Peru?

context: <b5_0>UNFPA<b5_0/> provided aid to Peru's reproductive health program in <a0_0>the mid-to-late '90s<a0_0/>. When it was discovered a Peruvian program had been engaged in carrying out coercive <a1_0><b6_0>sterilizations<b6_0/><a1_0/>, UNFPA called for <a2_0>reforms and protocols<a2_0/> to protect the rights of <a3_0><b7_0>women seeking assistance<b7_0/><a3_0/>. UNFPA was not involved in the scandal, but continued work with the country after the abuses had become public to help end the abuses and reform <a4_0><b8_0>laws and practices<b8_0/><a4_0/>.
